question: My mother wears gold earings, chain, bangles and two rings which my dad brought her.
answer:
QUESTION
The people who wear gold in this world, will this gold come after them on judgement day and burn them on their skin? I have read this somewhere.
ANSWER


Share:
There is no harm for a female to adorn herself with jewellery if she pays the Zakaat due on it. and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best Mufti Ebrahim Desai FATWA DEPT.
